channel.title: Comments on: Vols-au-Vents – Daring Bakers Challenge September 2009

item.title: By: Deseree
item.dc:creator: Deseree
item.description: Your pastries are perfectly golden and your fillings sound delicious, particularly the chicken and mushroom. Nice job on the challenge!
item.content:encoded: Your pastries are perfectly golden and your fillings sound delicious, particularly the chicken and mushroom. Nice job on the challenge!

item.title: By: Rilsta
item.dc:creator: Rilsta
item.description:
Your vols-au-vents look magnificent! So puffy! Great work!
Reading all the entries from the Daring Bakers is making me not so frightened of trying puff pastry myself!
item.content:encoded:
Your vols-au-vents look magnificent! So puffy! Great work!

Reading all the entries from the Daring Bakers is making me not so frightened of trying puff pastry myself!

item.title: By: lisa (dandysugar)
item.dc:creator: lisa (dandysugar)
item.description: Great job, beautiful airy pastry! Look at those layers. The salmon and cream cheese filling combination is calling my name. Love the pistachio one too.
item.content:encoded: Great job, beautiful airy pastry! Look at those layers. The salmon and cream cheese filling combination is calling my name. Love the pistachio one too.

item.title: By: Barbara
item.dc:creator: Barbara
item.description: Your Puffs are spectacular! Such a gorgeous color and so tall!
item.content:encoded: Your Puffs are spectacular! Such a gorgeous color and so tall!

item.title: By: Leona
item.dc:creator: Leona
item.description: Your vols-au-Vents turned out perfect. I love how you made two kinds which consist of savoury and sweet.
item.content:encoded: Your vols-au-Vents turned out perfect. I love how you made two kinds which consist of savoury and sweet.

item.title: By: Sophia
item.dc:creator: Sophia
item.description: Those are PERFECT little airy, thousand-layer bites! Wow! I am REALLY impressed...I esp love the salmon one, and the pistachio one! Lovely!
item.content:encoded: Those are PERFECT little airy, thousand-layer bites! Wow! I am REALLY impressed…I esp love the salmon one, and the pistachio one! Lovely!

item.title: By: Juliana
item.dc:creator: Juliana
item.description: Wow, all of them look so perfect...so yummie, I'd have a hard to to decide which one I want it first...great pictures!
item.content:encoded: Wow, all of them look so perfect…so yummie, I’d have a hard to to decide which one I want it first…great pictures!

item.title: By: Cakelaw
item.dc:creator: Cakelaw
item.description: These look devine!! I like the savoury fillings especially.
item.content:encoded: These look devine!! I like the savoury fillings especially.

item.title: By: Southern Grace Gourmet
item.dc:creator: Southern Grace Gourmet
item.description: Looks so delicious, and beautiful! Great job!
item.content:encoded: Looks so delicious, and beautiful! Great job!

item.title: By: Lexi
item.dc:creator: Lexi
item.description: Wow, they look lovely!! Love the pistachio praline, it has just set me off on a sugar craving, and the only sweet thing in the house is cooking chocolate (the sacrifices that people with a sweet tooth must make!) Anyway, I too was surprised by how easy it was to make the puff pastry part of the recipe, and how FIDDLY the forming into vols au vent was - it really turned me off making them again... Although your Portuguese custard tarts look scrumptious, so they could warrant a further puff pastry excursion :-)
item.content:encoded: Wow, they look lovely!! Love the pistachio praline, it has just set me off on a sugar craving, and the only sweet thing in the house is cooking chocolate (the sacrifices that people with a sweet tooth must make!) Anyway, I too was surprised by how easy it was to make the puff pastry part of the recipe, and how FIDDLY the forming into vols au vent was – it really turned me off making them again… Although your Portuguese custard tarts look scrumptious, so they could warrant a further puff pastry excursion ðŸ™‚
